titles.title: Health Care Freedom of Choice Act
To improve health care choice by providing for the tax deductibility of medical expenses by individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. Health Care Freedom of Choice Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction expenses paid, not compensated for by insurance or otherwise, for medical care.
